description.full: The spacecraft has hit the upper atmosphere. As the air infront of the craft is compressed, kinetic energy is transferred into thermal, slowing down the spacecraft and causing it to heat up.
description.guided: The spacecraft has hit the upper atmosphere. As the air infront of the craft is compressed, kinetic energy is transferred into thermal, slowing down the spacecraft and causing it to heat up.

description.full: The spacecraft will soon need to deploy its parachute, but the atmosphere is too thin at this altitude.
description.guided: The spacecraft will soon need to deploy its parachute, but the atmosphere is too thin at this altitude.

description.full: The atmosphere is now thin enough to deploy the parachute.
description.guided: The atmosphere is now thin enough to deploy the parachute. Press SPACE to deploy the parachute and jettison the heatshield.

description.full: The spacecraft is being slowed down by the parachute.
description.guided: The spacecraft is being slowed down by the parachute.

description.full: The spacecraft needs to inflate its large airbag to land softly on the Martian surface.
description.guided: The spacecraft needs to inflate its large airbag to land softly on the Martian surface. Press SPACE to inflate it.

description.full: The spacecraft is about to touch down on the surface of Mars.
description.guided: The spacecraft is about to touch down on the surface of Mars.

description.full: The spacecraft has landed on the surface of Mars.
description.guided: The spacecraft has landed on the surface of Mars.
